songs.title: Confide
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics From Snippet]

[Intro]
...ife
I need to get right
It's a long ride (Uhm)
The drugs help me hide
The drugs help me hide, oh

[Chorus]
I need to confide
True love’s hard to find
I'll wait for her to come find me
I'll even pay the fines
I need to confide
True love’s hard to find
I'll wait for her to come find me
I'll even pay the fines

[Verse 1]
Okay, It's been a long ride
Still the beginning of the ride
I'm gettin' high before the flights
L.A.X. to the Chi
Memories on my mind
Been reflecting on my life
Somethin' don't feel right
Down deep inside, I’m scared of my own demise
I need to confide to the love of my life, life
It’s getting dark outside
It's getting darker inside
You’re the only home in sight
I need a place to cry

[Chorus]
I need to confide
True love's hard to find
I'll wait for her to come find me
I'll even pay the fines
I need to confide
True love’s hard to find
I'll wait for her to come find me
I'll even pay the fines

[Verse 2]
I'm willing to pay the price
For you to stay the night
Bitch you can't leave my side
The only home in sight
These pills make me roll like dice
Converse about drugs, I'm only tryna break the ice
Bleedin' out, feel like a lost cause
Oxycodone until I lockjaw
I need to clean my act up, where's the Lysol?
I been pouring Actavis to sad songs
Who are you to tell me I'm wrong?
I'm heading outta space, I blast off
They wonder why I'm gone for so long
Still don't know where I belong

[Chorus]
I need to confide
True love's hard to find
I'll wait for her to come find me
I'll even pay the fines
I need to confide
True love's hard to find
I'll wait for her to come find me
I'll even pay the fines
